Author: blimpopotamus
Text: ARGH i almost had a meltdown today bc my fav jeans were just... not fitting. like ok jeez i bought these when i was ten pounds lighter i get it

Author: CHEM1C4LKID
Text: I'm kind of in the same boat, was doing well until Thanksgiving. Stuck gaining until the middle of last month, got a little back on track and then my nephews birthday party triggered another binge cycle that's still ongoing. The other day i had 800kcals of sweets for breakfast like why????? I don't need that. Wish I had some advice for you, but I can tell you that you're not alone!
